scripts.prepare:assets: mkdir -p public/assets/audio/sfx public/assets/images public/assets/videos public/source-videos tmp ../exports
scripts.convert: [ -z "$INPUT" ] && echo 'Usage: INPUT=video.mov OUTPUT=name npm run convert' || ffmpeg -i "$INPUT" -c:v libx264 -preset faster -crf 23 -pix_fmt yuv420p -c:a aac -movflags +faststart "public/source-videos/${OUTPUT}.mp4" -y
scripts.info:
echo 'Source videos:' && ls -la ../source-videos/ && echo '
Exports:' && ls -la ../exports/ && echo '
Compositions:' && npm run compositions:list
scripts.workflow:new: npm run sync:assets && npm run dev
scripts.workflow:render: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run render:hd
scripts.workflow:export-all: npm run render:mp4 && npm run render:social && npm run still:thumbnail
scripts.export:endtoend:mp4: remotion render EndToEnd tmp/EndToEnd.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/EndToEnd.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/EndToEnd.h264.mp4
scripts.export:endtoend:mp4:silent: remotion render EndToEnd tmp/EndToEnd_silent.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/EndToEnd_silent.mp4 -an -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/EndToEnd.h264_silent.mp4
scripts.export:hero:mp4:silent: remotion render EndToEnd tmp/hero.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 --prores-profile=auto && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/hero.mp4 -an -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/hero_end_to_end.h264_silent.mp4
scripts.export:taskinputrefinement:mp4: remotion render TaskInputRefinement tmp/TaskInputRefinement.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/TaskInputRefinement.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/TaskInputRefinement.h264.mp4
scripts.export:filefinder:mp4: remotion render FileFinder tmp/FileFinder.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/FileFinder.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/FileFinder.h264.mp4
scripts.export:plansynthesis:mp4: remotion render PlanSynthesis tmp/PlanSynthesis.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/PlanSynthesis.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/PlanSynthesis.h264.mp4
scripts.export:deepcustomization:mp4: remotion render DeepCustomization tmp/DeepCustomization.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/DeepCustomization.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/DeepCustomization.h264.mp4
scripts.export:costtracking:mp4: remotion render CostTracking tmp/CostTracking.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/CostTracking.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/CostTracking.h264.mp4
scripts.export:deepresearch:mp4: remotion render DeepResearch tmp/DeepResearch.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/DeepResearch.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/DeepResearch.h264.mp4
scripts.export:voicetranscription:mp4: remotion render VoiceTranscription tmp/VoiceTranscription.mp4 --codec h264 --crf=20 && ffmpeg -y -i tmp/VoiceTranscription.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 20 -preset veryslow -profile:v high -level 4.1 -movflags +faststart ../exports/VoiceTranscription.h264.mp4
